  "reporterEmailBody":"\u003Cp\u003ECyberSec team \u0026ndash; please can you investigate the attached suspicious email we have received.\u003C\/p\u003E\n\u003Cdiv\u003E\n\u003Cdiv dir=\u0022ltr\u0022\u003E\n\u003Cp class=\u0022x_MsoNormal\u0022\u003EWe don\u0026rsquo;t have anybody name Shiv or Raj in\u0026nbsp;the organization, and\u0026nbsp;moreover,\u0026nbsp;the return address seems to be\u0026nbsp;the spoofed\u0026nbsp;domain.\u003C\/p\u003E\n\u003C\/div\u003E\n\u003C\/div\u003E",
